Document.name: GetCurrentPosition
Document.summary: Get the current position of the executing instruction in the source code.
Document.returns: The current position in the source code.
Document.param: Set to true to apply the source code information to original source code.
Specify a thread context. Set to null to use the top thread context.
Specify a call stack index. Set to null to use the top call stack item of the specified thread context.
